name: Shot In The Dark (itch) (kaeyuhhh)
description:
Shot In The Dark is a 2D top-down stealth game where the player plays an injured and hungry bat who uses echolocation to navigate an obscured environment and must not alert predators lurking in the shadows.

Controls: 

WASD or Arrow Keys

Mouse click to shoot your echolocation

Shift to Dash

Shot In The Dark is currently a preproduction game. This is our teams first working prototype and we hope we can get feedback and support! Thank you for taking your time to view and possibly play our game!

The Team:

Producer & Game Designer - Mikayla Miklasz

Technical Designer - Walker McDonald

Systems Programmer - Eli Mcardle

Game & UI Artist - Sydney Kitchen

Programmer & Sound Designer - Viktor Filipovich
